color.description: Text color for the field. Inherits the theme's text dark color.
Background color for the field. Inherits the theme's base background color.

family.description: Font family used for field. Inherits the theme's default font.

start.description: Padding space above the field text.

end.description: Padding space below the field text.

start.description: Padding space left of the field text. Equal values in the inline axis.

end.description: Padding space right of the field text. Equal values in the inline axis.

color.description: Border color of the field.

size.description: Size of the icon used within the field.

spacer.description: Padding space used if an icon exists at the start or end of the field.

icon.description: Icon used to open a calendar from the field.
Icon used to open a drop-down selection from the field.
Icon used to indicate that a search term is expected to be entered in the field.

color.description: Background color for radio button and checkbox.

gap.description: Gap between radio button, checkbox and their label.

size.description: Size of the radio button and checkbox. Use an `em` unit to scale with label.

color.description: Border color for the radio button and checkbox.

start.description: The padding inline start of the label for the radio button and checkbox.

end.description: The padding inline end of the label for the radio button and checkbox.

start.description: The padding block start of the label for the radio button and checkbox.

end.description: The padding block end of the label for the radio button and checkbox.

color.description: Color of the radio dot.

size.description: Size of the radio button dot. Use an `em` unit to scale with label.

width.description: The length of the short side of the checkbox check.

height.description: The length of the long side of the checkbox check.

size.description: The width of the checkbox check.

color.description: The colour of the checkbox check.

radius.description: Border radius of the checkbox. 0.1875em is equal to 3px when font-size is 16px.

color.description: Background color of the radio button and checkbox on `hover` state.
Border color of the radio button and checkbox on `hover` state.
Label text color of field.
Placeholder text color of the inputter.
Text color for the mask of the inputter. Defaults to brightened version of the darkest color.

family.description: Font family used for a masked inputter. Defaults to monospaced Courier New or Courier.

weight.description: Weight of the font used for a masked inputter.

color.description: Icon color for the interactive elements like date, select, etc
Color of the field on `hover` state. Defaults to a darkened version of the color.
Border color of the field on `hover` state.
Color of the field on `focus` state.
Border color of the field on `focus` state.
Outline color for `keyboard focus` state. Defaults to theme's focus color.

offset.description: Outline offset for `keyboard focus` state. Defaults to theme's focus color.

style.description: Outline style for `keyboard focus` state. Defaults to theme's focus color.

width.description: Outline width for `keyboard focus` state. Defaults to theme's focus color.

color.description: Disabled text color. Defaults to theme's disabled color.
Disabled border color. Defaults to theme's disabled color.
Disabled background color. Defaults to a brightened version of theme's disabled color.
Disabled placeholder color. Defaults to theme's disabled color.

block.description: Margin space above and below the validation message. Equal values in the block axis.

gap.description: Gap between the validation message and icon.

color.description: Color indicative of a validation warning.

icon.description: Icon indicative of a validation warning.

color.description: Text color for the detail.
Text color for the `hover` state of the detail.

size.description: Font size for the detail heading.

start.description: Margin space above the detail heading.

end.description: Margin space below the detail heading.

gap.description: Gap between the detail icon and heading.

size.description: Font size for the detail content.

start.description: Margin space above the detail content.

end.description: Margin space below the detail content.

inline.description: Padding space at the start of the detail's content.

size.description: Size of the icon used within the detail.

open.description: Icon used to open the detail's content.

close.description: Icon used to close the detail's content.

position.description: Position of the detail's toggle icon. Valid values: `start`, `end`.

color.description: Outline color for `keyboard focus` state. Defaults to theme's focus color.

offset.description: Outline offset for `keyboard focus` state. Defaults to theme's focus color.

style.description: Outline style for `keyboard focus` state. Defaults to theme's focus color.

width.description: Outline width for `keyboard focus` state. Defaults to theme's focus color.

color.description: Border color of the detail. Defaults to a brightened version of the field color.
